section.title: Pinning a Virtual Machine to Another Host
section.para: You can use the Host Devices tab in the details pane of a virtual machine to pin it to a specific host.
If the virtual machine has any host devices attached to it, pinning it to another host will automatically remove the host devices from the virtual machine.

procedure.title: Pinning a Virtual Machine to a Host

step.para: Select a virtual machine and click the Host Devices tab in the details pane.
Click Pin to another host to open the Pin VM to Host window.
Use the Host drop-down menu to select a host.
Click OK to pin the virtual machine to the selected host.
